## Article checklist

### Pre-publish

* [ ] Write something with substance
* [ ] Find decent image
* [ ] Classify it
* [ ] Sit on it for a few days
* [ ] Read it out loud and check for spelling/grammar
* [ ] Ask local tech friends to review (Optional)
* [ ] Publish

### Post-publish

* [ ] mailing list
* [ ] Schedule Buffer
* [ ] pycoders.com/submissions
* [ ] Reddit /r/python
* [ ] Hacker News
* [ ] python.libhunt.com/contribute
* [ ] dev.to
* [ ] messenger
